tool_description: Validates pet food products against AAFCO nutritional standards and regulatory requirements for complete and balanced nutrition claims.

product_id.description: Unique identifier of the pet food product

life_stage.description: Target life stage: growth, maintenance, reproduction, or all_life_stages

error_messages: Unsupported species for AAFCO: Only dog and cat profiles are available
Invalid life stage: Use one of [growth, maintenance, reproduction, all_life_stages]
Insufficient nutritional data: All required guaranteed analysis values must be provided
Invalid nutritional values: Percentages must be positive numbers within reasonable ranges
usage: Provide product_id, all guaranteed analysis values, target species, and life_stage. Optionally include calcium and phosphorus levels for more comprehensive validation.

compliance_status.description: Overall compliance status: compliant, non-compliant, or insufficient_data

aafco_statement_valid.description: Whether product can claim AAFCO complete and balanced

deficient_nutrients.description: List of nutrients below AAFCO minimums

excessive_nutrients.description: List of nutrients above AAFCO maximums
